TURKS & CAICOS

6 DAYS/5 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|31px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”2px|||||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”|auto||200px||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|26px|0px|false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ module_alignment=”center” sticky_enabled=”0″][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”90px” custom_margin=”-22px||47px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT TURKS & CAICOS (PROVIDENCIALES)

Welcome to Turks & Caicos. The Turks and Caicos Islands, or TCI for short, are a British Overseas Territory consisting of the larger Caicos Islands and smaller Turks Islands, two groups of tropical islands in the Lucayan Archipelago of the Atlantic Ocean and northern West Indies. After arrival transfer to your hotel. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”125px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 02: PROVIDENCIALES – SUNSET TOUR (OPTIONAL)

See Providenciales in the evening light on this sunset safari-style tour. After convenient hotel pickup, you can enjoy the scenery instead of puzzling over directions and navigation on the way to Sapodila Beach, where you can swim and explore with guided commentary. Learn much more about the island’s history and culture than you would simply exploring on your own through your guide’s commentary.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”124px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 03: PROVIDENCIALES SIGHTSEEING

Providenciales sightseeing tour including The Conch Farm: You will visit various beaches with Rum Punch and attractions such as, The Hole, Conch Farm, (entry included), and the glorious cuisine from “Da Conch Shack” (sea food platter included) The tour has many photography opportunities on Blue Mountain and Snorkel spots at Sapodilla.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”41px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 04: PROVIDENCIALES – SUNSET CRUISE (OPTIONAL)

On adults only cruise, watch the sunset on the deck of a spacious catamaran off Grace Bay while you enjoy a glass of Champagne. This 2-hour tour, which includes hotel pickup and drop off, allows you to enjoy a spectacular sunset while rocking gently on the Caribbean waters. Dine on snacks, including fresh conch fritters, provided by a local restaurant while you toast the gorgeous surroundings with wine, Champagne, rum punch, or soft drinks.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”190px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”10px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 05: CRUISE WITH SNORKLING

Half Day Cruise from Providenciales with Snorkeling and Beach Picnic – The tour begins by cruising along the internationally-recognized Grace Bay beach on the north shore of Providenciales. The first stop will be the TCI barrier reef – the third largest reef system in the world. Guests will gear up and snorkel one of the most pristine and untouched underwater worlds in the world. After snorkeling, your captain will cruise to the south side of the islands where the first mate will hunt for wild conch. The captain will then cruise to one of the TCI cays where guests will be served lunch and will have the opportunity to explore the uninhabited cay.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”87px” custom_margin=”-4px|||||” custom_padding=”4px||22px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM TURKS & CAICOS (PROVIDENCIALES)

After checking out of hotel, we will depart for the airport to board your flight back home or to your next destination.

HAVE A SAFE TRIP![/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.22″ min_height=”873px” custom_margin=”-412px||142px|||” custom_padding=”0||50px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://twitter.com/#!/discoverdest” use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%292%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.instagram.com/discoverdestinations1″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%298%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″][/et_pb_blurb][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|26px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”20px|0px|0|0|false|false” column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||||||”]
